statements: UPDATE influencer_content_metadata SET performance_data = '{"likes": 100, "shares": 50, "views": 500}' WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND content_id = 456;
UPDATE influencer_content_metadata SET content_type = 'video', created_at = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE content_id = 789 AND influencer_id = 987;
UPDATE influencer_content_metadata SET performance_data = '[{"views": 1000, "likes": 500}]' WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND content_id = 456;
UPDATE influencer_content_metadata SET content_type = 'video', performance_data = '{"views": 1500, "likes": 700}' WHERE content_id = 789 AND influencer_id = 234;
UPDATE InfluencerContentMetadata SET performance_data = '{"engagement": 80, "impressions": 500}' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceData SET likes = 150, shares = 75 WHERE content_id = 5;
UPDATE InfluencerContentMetadata SET performance_data = '{"views": 1000, "likes": 500, "shares": 200}' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceData SET views = 1500, likes = 700 WHERE content_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers = 5000 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Posts SET likes = 1000, comments = 200, created_at = '2022-01-01' WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Influencers SET name = 'John Doe', engagement_rate = 3.5 WHERE id = 'a3f7c15e-89d2-4af9-935f-199244d44076';
UPDATE Posts SET likes = 1000, comments = 200, caption = 'New post caption' WHERE influencer_id = 'b8e3e1c8-8104-49e0-81e5-0bd2a4b0d8c9';
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET likes_count = 500, comments_count = 200 WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 1000, avg_likes_per_post = 4.5 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET likes_count = likes_count * 1.1, comments_count = comments_count + 50 WHERE influencer_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencer SET followers_count = 500 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE PerformanceData SET shares = 100, likes = 300 WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE Influencer SET followers_count = 5000, content_count = 1000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Optimization SET strategy = 'SEO', optimization_score = 0.95 WHERE optimization_id = 3;
